SEARCH
Module LabAssignment
Package entity

Class Student

java.lang.Object
entity.User
entity.Student
public class Student extends User
Represents a Student user in the system. Tracks the student's academic details (Year, Major) and manages their internship applications, including the limit of concurrent applications (Max 3) and eligibility rules based on seniority.

  • Constructor Details

    • Student

      public Student(String userId, String name, String password, int yearOfStudy, String major)
      Constructs a new Student user. Validates that the year of study is between 1 and 4. Initializes the student with a specific StudentFilter to manage their view of internships.
      Parameters:
      userId - The unique user ID.
      name - The student's full name.
      password - The login password.
      yearOfStudy - The year of study (1-4).
      major - The student's major.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If yearOfStudy is not 1-4 or major is null.

  • Method Details

    • getYearOfStudy

      public int getYearOfStudy()
      Gets the student's current year of study.
      Returns:
      The year (1-4).

    • getMajor

      public String getMajor()
      Gets the student's major.
      Returns:
      The major string.

    • getAppliedInternships

      public List<Application> getAppliedInternships()
      Retrieves a read-only list of all applications submitted by this student.
      Returns:
      An unmodifiable list of Application objects.

    • hasAcceptedPlacement

      public boolean hasAcceptedPlacement()
      Checks if the student has successfully accepted an internship placement.
      Returns:
      true if an application has been accepted.

    • getAcceptedApplication

      public Application getAcceptedApplication()
      Retrieves the specific application that was accepted by the student.
      Returns:
      The accepted Application, or null if none.

    • canApplyTo

      public boolean canApplyTo(Internship internship)
      Checks if the student is eligible to apply for a specific internship. Rules: Year 1 and 2 students can only apply to BASIC level internships. Year 3 and 4 students can apply to any level.
      Parameters:
      internship - The internship to check.
      Returns:
      true if eligible, false otherwise.

    • applyFor

      public boolean applyFor(Internship internship)
      Submits a new application for the specified internship. Validates that the student has not reached the limit of 3 active applications and meets the eligibility criteria.
      Parameters:
      internship - The internship to apply for.
      Returns:
      true if the application was created successfully; false if ineligible or quota reached.

    • withdraw

      public boolean withdraw(Application app)
      Requests a withdrawal for a specific application.
      Parameters:
      app - The application to withdraw.
      Returns:
      true if the request was sent successfully; false if the application does not belong to this student.

    • getActiveApplicationCount

      public int getActiveApplicationCount()
      Counts the number of currently active applications. An active application is defined as PENDING and not yet WITHDRAWN.
      Returns:
      The count of active applications.

    • accept

      public boolean accept(Application app)
      Accepts a successful internship offer. If successful, this sets the accepted application and automatically withdraws all other active applications.
      Parameters:
      app - The application to accept (must be SUCCESSFUL status).
      Returns:
      true if the acceptance was processed; false if the application is invalid or not successful.

    • viewEligibleInternships

      public List<Internship> viewEligibleInternships()
      Retrieves a list of internships from the student's existing applications that remain eligible.
      Returns:
      A list of internships.
